sequences.description: H1 heading 'Fresh looks, bold stories, real life', subheading paragraph, two CTA buttons ('See case', 'All stories'), plus grid of 3 images
sequences.reason: Page intro with prominent heading, subheading, CTAs and images. Classic hero pattern at the top of page. Side-by-side layout (text left, images right) requires a hero variant.

sequences.description: Two-column layout: large image on left, breadcrumb (Home > Case studies) + H2 heading + author (Taylor Brooks) + date (June 12, 2024) + read time on right
sequences.reason: Side-by-side content (image | article metadata) cannot be typed as default content. Obvious match with columns block.

sequences.description: Centered H2 heading 'Style in every snapshot' with subtitle 'Peek the latest looks in action'
sequences.reason: Author can type a heading and paragraph normally. Centering is CSS styling.

sequences.description: 4x2 grid of 8 square images (hip-hop dance, beach, concert, campus life, gaming, mobile game, fashion, campus tour)
sequences.reason: Grid of structured image items requires block layout. Cards block with image-only content.

sequences.description: Tabbed content with 4 panels. Each panel: person image + name + title + testimonial quote. Tab menu with avatar thumbnails. People: Alex Rivera (Streetwear Enthusiast), Taylor Kim (Casual Style Blogger), Jordan Ellis (Trend Spotter), Morgan Blake (Party Scene Curator).
sequences.reason: Interactive tabbed interface with switchable content panels. Obvious match with tabs block.

sequences.description: Centered H2 heading 'Latest articles' with subtitle 'Fresh looks, bold moves'
sequences.reason: Author can type a heading and paragraph normally.

sequences.description: 4-column grid of article cards. Each card: image, category tag, date, H3 heading. Cards link to blog posts.
sequences.reason: Repeating structured pattern of article cards in a grid. Obvious match with cards block.

sequences.description: H2 heading 'Got questions? We've got answers.' with subheading 'Fashion FAQs, answered fast'
sequences.reason: Author can type a heading and paragraph normally.

sequences.description: 4 expandable FAQ items: 'How do I spot the latest trends?', 'Can I share my own outfit pics?', 'Where do you find your style inspo?', 'How can I join your community?'
sequences.reason: Expandable Q&A sections need interactive decoration. Obvious match with accordion block.

sections.name: Bottom CTA
sections.sectionMetadataNote: Skipped: hero block has intrinsic background image overlay. Full-bleed, edge-to-edge design is block-specific, not section styling.

sequences.description: Full-bleed background image (networking event) with dark overlay. H2 heading 'Fresh looks, bold stories, real life', subheading paragraph, 'See more' CTA button.
sequences.reason: Hero block with background image + text overlay + CTA. Matches standard hero structure (background image row + content row).

hero.structure: 1 column, 3 rows. Row 1: block name. Row 2: background image (optional). Row 3: title + subheading + CTA.

columns.structure: Multiple columns per row. Row 1: block name. Row 2+: content cells side by side.

cards.structure: 2 columns per row. Row 1: block name. Each subsequent row: image cell + text cell (title, description, CTA).

tabs.structure: 2 columns per row. Row 1: block name. Each subsequent row: tab label + tab content.

accordion.structure: 2 columns per row. Row 1: block name. Each subsequent row: question title + answer content.
